page.title: 11SPEED CHECK
page.content: We saw that many vehicles appeared to be ignoring the 30 mph speed limit in the village and so we set out to check on this. We measured out 100 yards and put a cone and a person at each end. 1 person put his hand up when a vehicle went by and the person at the other end started a stopwatch and when it reached him he stopped the watch. When we had timed for half an hour we typed the results into our computer and then worked out the speeds. We did this at different times on different days. {CARS} 90 cars; 34 went over the limit, the top speed was 45.4 mph. {VANS} 28 vans; 7 went over the limit the top speed was 40.9 mph. 5 BUSES, 17 LORRIES, 4 TRACTORS & 1 MOTORBIKE were within the limit. {N.B. One day the limit went down to 20 mph, loose chippings on the road, and 7 out of 19 CARS exceeded it.}
